gate.learning.learners.weka
Class WekaLearning

java.lang.Object
  gate.learning.learners.weka.WekaLearning

public class WekaLearning
extends Object

The interface between the Weka learner and the data defined in the ML Api, which convert the data into the format a Weka learner can use.
